txt.en: You have been tasked with repairing a series of forges within an ancient forge in Gundabad.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have discovered an ancient and powerful forge within the halls of Gundabad. They have located several forges that could be essential to our bid to reclaim this place. However, these forges are being protected by several powerful creatures.

'Enter the forge, repair the forges found throughout the area, and defeat cold-drakes and frost grims to secure the area!'
'Amongst the halls of Gundabad, there lies an ancient forge that, if secured, could turn the tide of battle within these halls.\n\n'Your mission is to repair several forges and secure the area.'
The monster commander in this mission will attempt to summon blizzards.
Your mission is to repair several forges and secure the area.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to the forge.
'Well done! With the forges repaired and the area secured, the foundation has been laid for our work in Gundabad!'
